content: what i love about this christmas tree is that not only is it a fun and super quick make all of 15 minutes it has a multitude of uses as well besides decking out your christmas tree and giving it a lovely modern look you can use it to add a little extra touch to your presents or packages > have some fun with this unique pair > what pair you ask the **downloadable > pdf** pattern listed here **includes 2 > patterns ** > 1 15-minute christmas tree > 2 christmas tree earrings **skill level ** beginner **materials ** dk yarn 4 mm crochet hook ten 8mm pearl beads scissors 2 darning needles 1 large and 1 small **size ** with the yarn and hook specified 15-minute christmas tree is approximately 5 long & 2 5 at its widest point **yarn alternatives ** any dk #3 or 8 ply yarn
